name: Tumbleweed (treeno)
description:
=================================

Tumbleweed

Tumbleweed is a 2D action shooter game where you fight robbing enemies on a moving train. 

Levels get progressively harder, with a few levels that are meant to keep your sanity. Once you reach wave 9, you are now in HARDMODE

Tumbleweed almost acts as a bullet hell game, with many enemies to dodge in order to keep your lives and your precious coins. 

Upgrade guns and buy extra lives with the coins you earn from defeating your enemies!

Also including Safe mode! Safe mode is the same game with the same concept except with less violence. Guns are replaced with water guns, and less violent noises are replaced with the original. Just press "L" on the menu screen and Safe mode will be enabled! (Safe mode was built since this was for a school submission)
